1.「あの……すみません。| 私 シュリナと申す者ですが| 占いの館は こちらでしょ: Excuse me. My name is Shrina. Is this the|Divine House?

7.「演技だけでなく 占いまで こなせるなんて| 先生は本当に 何でも お出来になる: You can not only act but also tell fortunes,|you really can do anything. I admire you even|more!

|theater will end...

11.「だから 私 本当は……。| いえ……でも こんなこと先生には……。: So I really... no, but... but I didn't want to|tell you...

31.「では 私たちの占いで シュリナさんの悩みを| すっきり 解決してあげましょう。: Well then, let's give Shrina a clean slate for|her troubles with our divination. Good luck|<pc>!

41.「……以前 占い師の 究極の目的とは| 人々の悩みを 解決することだと 言いまし: I once said that the ultimate goal of fortune|tellers is to solve people's problems. And|what we can do to help you do that is...

57.<if_woman>「母さん。彼女が さっき話していた人です。| 私たちを 手伝: <if_woman>Mom. She's the one I was talking about|earlier. It's our new fortune teller|<pc> who is helping us.<else>Mom. He's the one I was talking about earlier.|It's our new fortune teller <pc> who|is helping us.<endif>

You took us in as orphans, taught us|divination, and gave us a way to live... and I|truly respect you as a mother and a teacher. I|

74.「また 新しい仕事を 手伝ってくださる時は| 占い師の状態で 私を訪ねてください: If you ever need help with a new job, please|visit me again in my fortune teller state. I|look forward to your next visit!
